name: Add a row to a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet from a Google Ads Lead Forms submission
description:
Please disable your ad blockers when working with our Google Ads apps. The ad blockers may cause unexpected behavior.

Every time a new Google Ads Lead form is submitted, Make will automatically add a new row to a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet. 

The template expects your lead form to collect at least these fields:
1) Full Name
2) User Email
3) User Phone
